summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Electronics Board Inventory Management System. Backend APIs working excellently (17/18 tests passed). Frontend core functionality working with minor JavaScript issues in Select components. Mobile responsiveness confirmed working.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Very low - authentication still works correctly

ui_bugs.issue: JavaScript runtime errors related to Select.Item value prop validation
ui_bugs.details: Select components throwing 'must have a value prop that is not an empty string' errors

integration_issues.issue: Some timeout issues when navigating to boards section

action_item_for_E1: Fix Select component JavaScript errors by ensuring all SelectItem components have proper value props. The errors are: 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'. Also investigate timeout issues in boards section navigation.
